svg.text: Comparative Risk Assessment: How Country-Specific Factors Influence Renewable Energy Project Evaluation
West African Renewable Energy Investment Risk Matrix
✅ RECOMMENDED: Ghana Wind Farm (91.3% success probability, 19.2% IRR, excellent regulatory framework)
✅ ALTERNATIVE: Kenya Hydro Station (89.1% success probability, 18.5% IRR, strong infrastructure)
⚠️ PROCEED WITH CAUTION: Nigeria Solar Complex (84.7% success probability, currency risk concerns)
Multi-Country Risk Comparison - FinergyCloud XGBoost Analysis (Country-Specific Risk Assessment Framework)
